mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, boardId = #{boardId}, memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT A.* FROM article AS A INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id WHERE B.code = #{boardCode} ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE B.code = #{boardCode} ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
